data.message: Fix Phase 1B structural issues: Fixed: (A) Migration module renamed to m001_add_vectors.py with importlib loader; (B) sqlite-vec now uses enable_load_extension(True) + serialize_float32() for proper vector format; (C) FTS table now has text column populated from artifact_to_text(), tags stored as space-separated; (D) FTS queries properly escaped via _escape_fts_query() to handle special chars like :-*(). FTS rebuilt with 172 artifacts.
data.outcome: Fixed: (A) Migration module renamed to m001_add_vectors.py with importlib loader; (B) sqlite-vec now uses enable_load_extension(True) + serialize_float32() for proper vector format; (C) FTS table now has text column populated from artifact_to_text(), tags stored as space-separated; (D) FTS queries properly escaped via _escape_fts_query() to handle special chars like :-*(). FTS rebuilt with 172 artifacts.
